A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie had some great moments\, but that wasn't enough to make up for all the flaws in its pacing and storytelling. It was an hour too long with subplots that could have been dropped entirely\, while failing to address so many of the subplots that had been opened in the Force Awakens. I did enjoy some aspects of this film\, but I also found myself constantly asking when it would be over from 1/3 of the way in. I'd love to see a super cut of this film that focuses only on Rey\, Luke and Kylo Ren\, and leaves out everything else. This movie only gets a pass from me because of how well some of those core scenes worked.
